about_the_game:
Who Are You!? is a psychological sci-fi horror game, where you'll face the unknown in order to save your family.

Features

  • Interactive items

  • Puzzles

  • Immersive environment

  • Explore horrifying places and interact with the items to progress through the story

  • Immerse yourself into a deep psychological experience

  • Delve into the truth of what's behind the disappearance of your wife

Story

You play as Ray, a family man who suffered the disappearance of Amy, his wife. Twenty years later, a rare cassette appears at his doorstep. He listens to it, hearing Amy's voice asking for help, this leads him to the cabin where she disappeared, only to discover that now his only daughter Mattie, is in danger.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Corpses, Blood, General Mature Content

name: Who Are You!? Demo
short_description: Get immersed into a deep sci-fi psychological horror experience, where you'll have to fight through your memories and emotions while reality blurs when you try to understand the disappearance of your wife 20 years ago, and the current whereabouts of your daughter.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
